layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus came pro -- claim -- ing: God's king -- dom has drawn near! For this your way of think -- ing must be fresh and clear. Re -- pent and change your view! Con -- si -- der Him a -- new. Je -- sus came pro -- claim -- ing and He says this to you: Re -- pent and be -- lieve! Re -- pent and be -- lieve! Je -- sus came pro -- claim -- ing: Re -- pent and be -- lieve! R -- E -- P -- E -- N -- T! B -- E -- L -- I -- E -- V -- E! Je -- sus came pro -- claim -- ing: Re -- pent and be -- lieve!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus came proclaiming: God's kingdom has drawn near! For this your way of thinking must be fresh and clear. Repent and change your view! Consider Him anew. Jesus came proclaiming and He says this to you:
Repent and believe! Repent and believe! Jesus came proclaiming: Repent and believe! R-E-P-E-N-T! B-E-L-I-E-V-E! Jesus came proclaiming: Repent and believe!
